ProjectTitle: Identification of Glial Contributions to Fragile X Syndrome
InitialFeedbackHistory:
26/07/2022
Please give some more detail in your DMP according to the feedback in the attached file. Since you write that you still have to recruit a postdoc to work on this project its probably best to make these revisions together with this postdoc who will likely generate and document most of the datasets, please submit your updated DMP as intermediate. 
If you have any further questions, feel free to contact the reviewer at onderzoek2bergen@kuleuven.be . We can schedule a meeting to go over the feedback.
For example DMPs see: www.kuleuven.be/english/research/associatienet/support/scholcomm/rdm/ku-leuven-example-dmps/example-dmps-from-ku-leuven-researchers
label: good with suggestions
